attributes.action: Setup an independent Political Facts and Information Commission
attributes.background: During both the Scottish and EU referendum, the public heard facts and figures from all different Political parties, a lot of the these conflicted. I would petition the government of the U.K. To set up a body that would filter info from all parties and publish agreed facts for future elections, etc.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139800
